overview: Dr. Carson's research focuses on cancer risk reduction and prevention for all populations, primarily by helping individuals achieve healthier weights. Using a bio-behavioral model, Dr. Carson's research program examines how social, behavioral, and biological factors intersect to influence health outcomes.
research_interests:
